description: Bruce Beckham is obsessed with trying every fad diet that crosses his plate. When the tall, beefcake daddy hears that Diego Sans has an unconventional new meal plan, he jumps at the opportunity. The connoisseur has no idea what he's in for as Diego blindfolds him and teases his mouth, first with phallic foods then with his long, thick cock. Before long, Bruce bends over and lets Diego drill his hole deep in this sweet and spicy scene that will leave more than your mouth watering.
title: Taste Test
